sen.j: 戸隠流（とがくしりゅう、とがくれりゅう）は、忍術の流派のひとつ。
sen.e: Togakushi-ryu (also called Togakure-ryu) school is one of ninjutsu (ninja art) schools.

sen.j: 平安時代末期、戸隠山で修験道を学び、木曽義仲に仕えた仁科大助（戸隠大助）が始祖（異説もある）。
sen.e: The founder was Daisuke NISHINA (Daisuke TOGAKURE) who learned Shugendo (Japanese ascetic and shamanistic practice in mountainous sites) in Mt. Togakushi and served Yoshinaka KISO in the end of Heian period (there is also a different theory).

sen.j: 木曽義仲が源義経に討たれた後は伊賀に逃れ、伊賀流忍術をも取り入れて完成させたとされる。
sen.e: It is considered that, after Yoshinaka KISO was killed by MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune, Daisuke NISHINA escaped to Iga Province and completed Togakushi-ryu school by incorporating Iga style ninjutsu.

sen.j: その後は修験者を通じて全国に広まったと言う。
sen.e: It is said that thereafter Togakushi-ryu school was spread throughout Japan by ascetic Buddhist monks.
